name: Climax Heroines
description:
Chinami, a warrior and her childhood friend, Haruka learn that the most powerful witch in their old hometown, Morgana has gone crazy. Morgana has been digging inside of her home, into deep catacombs and thus causing monsters to come crawling out of it. Many people have tried to go and stop this monster invasion but no one has come back.
Craft various weapons and armor as you make your way across each level of a dungeon with randomized loot.
